alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Bronx, western Suffolk and northern Nassau Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whitestone, or over Throgs Neck Bridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Flushing, Mott Haven, Huntington Station, GleHigh pressure then slowly builds in through the end of the week.n Cove, Syosset, Great Neck, Oyster Bay, RFK Bridge, Throgs Neck Bridge, Laguardia Airport, Jackson Heights, Forest Hills, Bayside, Whitestone and Port Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk
